title: Kiribati
officialName: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati
summary: Kiribati is a country in Micronesia. The capital is South Tarawa. Population: 120,740. Area: 811 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Kiribati is divided into two halves. While the upper half has a red field, at the center of which is a yellow frigate bird flying over the top half of a rising yellow sun with seventeen visible rays, the lower half is composed of six horizontal wavy bands of white alternating with blue to depict the ocean.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
